remarks: Extract a symbol of a word from the concatenation of the word with two single symbols.  (Contributed by AV, 22-Sep-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 13-Jan-2020.)
statement: ccat2s1fvw $p |- ( ( ( W e. Word V /\ I e. NN0 /\ I < ( # ` W ) ) /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( ( ( W concat <" X "> ) concat <" Y "> ) ` I ) = ( W ` I ) ) $.
